title: Holly Willoughby shrieks at Phillip Schofield’s cheeky Halloween prank
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Holly Willoughby got a big fright thanks to her prankster co-host Phillip Schofield on This Morning today.

The presenters were about to check in with the Loose Women panellists to find out what they had coming up on their show.

As Holly spoke to camera Phil and slipped a fake skeleton hand up his sleeve and was slowly moving it towards her face.

She said: ‘Time to check in with the Loose Women. Hi ladies what’s got you talking today?’

The last bit of her sentence was lost in a high-pitched shriek as she recoiled from Phil’s creepy prop.

Phil was loving it obviously and the studio and the Loose Women ladies burst out laughing.

The shocked presenter put a hand to her chest and said: ‘What are you doing?’

Prankster Phil played a trick on Holly (Picture: ITV)

Phil was loving it of course (Picture: ITV)

Holly joked she was ‘I’m coming to be a Loose Woman’ before storming off camera.

Loose Women host Ruth Langsford said: ‘Every time. Every time he gets her, oh that’s hilarious.’

Later in the show Holly demanded that Phil apologise, but after doing so Schofe cheekily admitted that he ‘wasn’t sorry’.

It came ahead of a segment about decorations you can get to make your home spook-tacular for Halloween.

Phil and Holly showed the creepiest decorations to make your home spook-tacular (Picture: ITV)

This year’s Halloween theme on the show will be The Wizard of Oz, following their circus theme last year.

Phil will dress up as the scarecrow with Holly putting on some red shoes as Dorothy.

To find their Toto, This Morning will be launching Wizard Of Pawz: Our Search for Toto to help find a cute canine companion for the episode.

This Morning airs weekdays from 10.30am on ITV.
